import React from 'react'; import CountUp from 'react-countup'; const Cards = ({data:{confirmed,recovered,deaths,lastUpdate}}) => { if(!confirmed){ return 'loading...'; } return ( <>

Infected

{new Date(lastUpdate).toDateString()}

Footer
Header
Recovered

{new Date(lastUpdate).toDateString()}

Header
Deaths

{new Date(lastUpdate).toDateString()}

) } export default Cards;
